arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the placement group.

name.description: The name of the placement group.

partitionCount.description:
The number of partitions to create in the
placement group.  Can only be specified when the `strategy` is set to
`partition`.  Valid values are 1 - 7 (default is `2`).

placementGroupId.description: The ID of the placement group.

spreadLevel.description:
Determines how placement groups spread instances. Can only be used
when the `strategy` is set to `spread`. Can be `host` or `rack`. `host` can only be used for Outpost placement groups. Defaults to `rack`.

strategy.description: The placement strategy. Can be `cluster`, `partition` or `spread`.

tags.description: Key-value map of resource tags. .If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.
